Weapon.Name: Flameheart Blade
Weapon.Description: A sword birthed from the core of a fallen star, imbued with eternal flames.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Engulfs the enemy in celestial fire, causing additional burn damage over time.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As you swing the Flameheart Blade, a trail of fire follows, searing everything in its path.

Weapon.Name: Galeforce Dagger
Weapon.Description: A dagger so light, it seems to slice the air itself. Favored by the assassins of the Windshadow Clan.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Unleashes a powerful gust, knocking enemies back.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a swift strike, the air splits, sending your foes flying.

Weapon.Name: Starshard Staff
Weapon.Description: A mystical staff that channels the cosmic energies of the night sky.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Summons a meteor shower over the battlefield.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The heavens obey your command, raining down celestial fury upon your enemies.
